title: U.S. energy shortfall threatens AI race against China: Nuclear plans fall short as power grids hit limits
description: U.S. Energy Deficit Cripples AI Growth – China produces 10,000+ TWh annually (double the U.S.), while America’s grid is maxed out, forcing AI data centers to halt expansion. Trump’s proposed 10 nuclear plants would add just 100 TWh—far too little, too late. C…
